about: High performance self-hosted photo and video management solution.
summary:
# Project Summary

## 1. Core Content and Main Problems Solved
**Core Content:**
This is a high-performance self-hosted photo and video management solution designed to help users manage and store personal or family photos and videos efficiently and securely.

**Main Problems Solved:**
- **Data Privacy Issues:** By using self-hosting, it avoids uploading sensitive photos and videos to third-party cloud services.
- **Multimedia Management Issues:** It provides one-stop photo and video management functions, including upload, backup, search, classification, and sharing.
- **Performance Optimization Issues:** Supports fast processing and playback of high-resolution images and videos, meeting users' needs for smooth experiences.

---

## 2. Breakthroughs or Innovations
- **Multi-platform Support:** Simultaneously supports mobile and web platforms, making it convenient for users to access and manage content on different devices.
- **Intelligent Features:** Integrates facial recognition, object detection, CLIP (contrastive language image pre-training model), and other functions, allowing users to quickly search and classify multimedia files through metadata, objects, and faces.
- **User-defined Storage Structure:** Allows users to customize storage directories and organization methods, enhancing flexibility.
- **Offline Support:** The mobile app provides offline browsing functionality, suitable for use when the network is unavailable.
- **360-degree Image Display:** Supports panoramic image viewing, providing convenience for virtual reality enthusiasts.
- **LivePhoto/MotionPhoto Support:** Not only supports static images and regular videos but also backs up and plays dynamic photos.
- **OAuth and API Key Integration:** Facilitates secondary development by developers and enterprise users or integration with other systems.

---

## 3. Good Ideas for Startup Projects
Based on the technical features and functions of this project, here are some directions suitable for startups:

### (1) **Multimedia Management Service for Individual Users**
- Provide a subscription-based cloud service based on Immich technology to help users more easily manage and back up their photos and videos.
- For privacy-sensitive users, emphasize "zero-knowledge encryption" and "fully self-hosted" characteristics.

### (2) **Family Multimedia Sharing Platform**
- Develop an application focused on sharing photos and videos among family members, automatically categorizing family member photos using facial recognition.
- Add a timeline feature to create a "family memory" module that displays important moments from past years.

### (3) **Enterprise-level Multimedia Asset Management Tool**
- Expand this project into an enterprise-level solution for managing internal multimedia resources within a company (such as marketing materials, product images, etc.).
- Add permission management functionality to ensure that different departments can only access authorized content.

### (4) **Travel Photography Community**
- Combine global map functionality to create a travel photography enthusiast community where users can upload and tag shooting locations.
- Provide AI recommendation functionality to recommend similar travel photography works based on user interests.

### (5) **Multimedia Teaching Tools for Education**
- Develop a multimedia teaching resource management platform for schools or training institutions, allowing teachers to easily upload, classify, and share courseware, videos, and other content.
- Integrate OCR functionality to extract text from images as learning materials.

### (6) **Smart Album Hardware Device**
- Embed Immich's functionality into a smart album hardware device, allowing users to directly synchronize photos from their phones via Wi-Fi and display them on a large screen.
- Support simultaneous upload and viewing by multiple people, suitable for family gatherings or event recording scenarios.

Through these directions, the core technology and functions of Immich can be fully utilized to create products and services with market competitiveness.

## Disclaimer - ⚠️ The project is under **very active** development. - ⚠️ Expect bugs and breaking changes. - ⚠️ **Do not use the app as the only way to store your photos and videos.** - ⚠️ Always follow [3-2-1](https://www.backblaze.com/blog/the-3-2-1-backup-strategy/) backup plan for your precious photos and videos! > [!NOTE] > You can find the main documentation, including installation guides, at https://immich.app/. ## Links - [Documentation](https://immich.app/docs) - [About](https://immich.app/docs/overview/introduction) - [Installation](https://immich.app/docs/install/requirements) - [Roadmap](https://immich.app/roadmap) - [Demo](#demo) - [Features](#features) - [Translations](https://immich.app/docs/developer/translations) - [Contributing](https://immich.app/docs/overview/support-the-project) ## Demo Access the demo [here](https://demo.immich.app).
